Portal 2 is a marvelous journey through time and space, through mind, conscience and soul. 
It envolves you in its universe, in its settings, with its characters and their stories - even if they appear very little in the game.
It's funny, inteligent and deep. A storytelling masterpiece.
Oh, and it has some cool puzzles.

Ugh, it's worse than the first one.  HERP DERP ROBOTS DIE ALSO YOU'RE AN ORPHAN.  Unfunny.  The opposite of funny.  And I feel bad that I paid for it because I got the first one for free and should have learned my lesson then.

This game is awesome.  It expands on everything done in the first, with some incredible writing.  Ten of the best dollars I've ever spent.

I don't even know how to begin to describe this game. It's got an amazing story, brand new puzzle elements, and loveable-and hateable-characters. The co-op has its very own storyline, where you and a friend play as two surprisingly adorable and anthropomorphically natured robots, who are trained to be used as partnered test subjects to replace human subjects. The humour in this game is great, witty but not difficult to comprehend. The game reveals many things about the mysterious Aperture Laboraatories, and I wholeheartedly reccomend that you buy it if you have the money and have any interest in the Portal series or puzzle games (especially puzzle platformers).
Awesome? You bet!
Круто. В традициях первой части. Интересные головоломки, отличный юмор
There isn't a word yet to describe this game's awesomeness. So I took the liberty of creating one. AWESMATICAL.
Awesome game! Must play. But is so short.

just finished portal 2 and gotta say this. thank you valve for making a awesome game with the story plus music in the end for the turrets and credits beatiful. for friends woirth getting portal 2 if you love 1st person shooter style plus puzzle solving. i give it 5 stars or if i have 2 portal ways just throw them in there and it will be infinite stars.
Clever puzzles, hilarious dialog, loveable and memorable characters, and an amazing co-op experience. My favorite game of 2011.
This is just AMAZING! One of THE BEST games I have ever played. You need to get this. It's definately worth every penny.

Honestly, great game.

Graphics are much better since it uses the L4D branch of the Source Engine. That being said, it's the same game it was before but vastly improved. New dynamics such as the gels make sence in this longer game. Takes about 6-8 hours to play at a relaxed pace.

The metascore of 95, it's the highest I've seen - and it has something for everyone. Great work VaLve!

Portal 2 est tout simplement un jeu magnifique. Graphiquement superbe, des musiques au top, un gamplay encore plus approfondie que le premier volet. L'humour est vraiment présente ce qui donne une autre ambiance, l'histoire est super bien faite. Réussir a faire ressentir de l'émotion par des robots!! Histoire courte mais réellement intéréssante, un mode coopération vraiment intéréssant! Portal 2 mérite bien ces bonnes notes!
Che dire... è un cazzo di capolavoro. Level design magnifico, enigmi sempre azzeccati e una caratterizzazione dei personaggi di altissimo livello.

One of the best Games ever made!

Created by clever people for clever people...

Portal 1 was in essence a tech demo. Portal 2 is a full-fledged game with even more hilarious dialogue, more story, much more varied environments, and has some really interesting insight into the background the the mysterious Aperture Science Labs.

Mr. Game 2.0 Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos del 2011, en cualquier coleccion de un buen gamer debe estar Portal 2, que complementa la maravillosa y brillante historia de la Saga Portal, una revolucion en los juegos de puzzles, es ingenioso, creativo, altamente divertido, una historia completisima, y muchos calificativos mas describen este maravilloso juego. Sin duda alguna Valve lo sabe hacer y prueba de ello es este Señor Juego.

Just a perfect game. A brilliant blend of masterful narrative, mind-bending puzzles, fantastic characters and just all-round good fun. One of the masterpieces of this generation of consoles. Very low price now on Steam as well.
Very good game, BAFTA Game of the year 2011, best story and design also, worth every penny

Yet another masterpiece crafted by the geniuses at Valve. While the puzzles in singleplayer aren't as difficult as I'd hoped they'd be, the co-op puzzles more than make up for it. However, difficulty aside, Portal 2 boasts an amazing storyline coupled with memorable characters. The entire presentation feels very polished, and with constant humour waiting to be found in each test chamber, Portal 2 is a work of art that I strongly recommend playing.
This game is so AWESOME, you can play co-op with your friend. AND NEW TEST CHAMBER SO BUY IT!
If GLaDOS bad, why sexy?

This game is amazing. It has great storyline, characters and it is a really good puzzler.
I recommend this game to everybody. Portal 2 is the best game ever!
Thank you Valve!
Un gran juego que mezcla agilidad, inteligencia y mucho humor en un perfecto cócktail de aventuras.Simplememte, se tiene más que merecida la buena fama que tiene. Muy recomendado.

PORTAL 2 IS AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please friend me if you have Portal 2 on PC or Mac.
Excelente título, muy novedoso y muy superior en lo que respecta a Portal "1". La posibilidad de juego cooperativo añade además una excelente experiencia de juego.

Portal 2 ясно показывает, что цифра "2" в названии стоит не просто так. Эта игра по всем пунктам больше, масштабнее и... "загадочнее" первой части. Одиночная кампания обзавелась проработанным сюжетом, действие стало более осмысленным, на часть вопросов игроку были даны ответы. Проблема лишь в том, что игра целиком выстроена по старой схеме и того "ВАУ"-эффекта, который присутствовал в первой части здесь уже нет... Впрочем, все это мелочи, на которые можно смело закрыть глаза.
if you dont have this game buy it right now
The only way this game is worth playing is with a cordute. Also you can trap people down long hallways with turrets. worth it.
